title: Lawyer Gifts – (2 Sided) Funny Unique Novelty Stemless Wine Glass Birthday or Christmas Gifts For Paralegal, Attorney, Legal Assistant, or Law Student - Lawyer Gifts For Women & Men
features: LAWYER GIFTS FOR HER OR HIM - Tired of searching through all the boring coffee mug listings for the perfect gifts? Want a humorous and unique gift that would be sure to put a smile on your lawyer friend or law school student’s face? The good news is that the search is over! Our cute stemless wine glass makes the best gift for any attorney in the family. This glass would even make a great gift for wife from husband

SUPERIOR GIFTABILITY - Each traditional stemless wine glass sold by Funny Bone Products holds 15 fluid ounces of your favorite champagne, red or white wine and comes packaged safely bubble wrapped and in its very own white cardboard box which makes it a breeze to wrap as a stocking stuffer for mom.

UNMATCHED DURABILITY - Unlike most other wine glasses on the market, the glassware from Funny Bone Products is made right here in the USA and is printed using premium quality ceramic inks. Each and every glass is then kiln-fired at 1200 degrees to bake the image onto the glass, making it truly permanent and able to withstand years of dishwashing abuse.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - Your happiness is our number one priority. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your glassware, contact us directly on Amazon for a no-questions-asked refund or replacement.

THE USES ARE ENDLESS – Our customers find this wine glass useful for any occasion including funny Christmas gifts for women & men who are lawyers, humorous birthday gifts for attorney friend, white elephant gift exchanges, law office gifts, law professor gifts, gifts for best friends, unique gifts for passing the bar, gifts for law school graduates…and the list goes on
description: So you’ve searched Amazon far and wide for the ultimate unique funny lawyer, paralegal, or legal assistant gifts available. Perhaps you’ve stumbled across gift ideas that you feel your friend or relative would never use? We’re glad you’ve found this gem of a hilariously funny and one of a kind gift for any lawyer, attorney, or law school student who enjoys the occasional glass of their favorite vino or prosecco.

Let’s face it, every kitchen in America has wine glasses in them, most sit on the shelf, blank and boring. Why not spruce the cabinets up and buy a wine glass with some laughter on it.Nothing is more humorous than a personalized stemless wine glass with a cute saying on the side to help your gift recipient unwind after a long day’s work. This wine glass shows the scales of justice on one side and states “
Good Day, Bad Day, and Don’t Ask
” on the other side. It’s a simple yet amusing saying that will be sure to put a smile on legal professional’s face from ear to ear.
Ready to make your friends laugh? Order today!
Simply click the “Add to Cart” button and Amazon will promptly ship the item to your door.
Don’t forget to pick up a wine glass for yourself as well! We wouldn’t want you missing out on wine night!
